attributes.action: Why Target the homeless.. Leave them Alone
attributes.additional_details:
Why are the Metropolitan Police Targeting the Homeless! By taking away the only comfort they have, which could end up in the deaths in our communities.. Even though  some of the homeless are from other countries! they are still Human Beings..

Leave The Homeless Alone and track real criminals like

Paedophile's, Murderers, Fraudsters, & Gang related Crimes

rejection.details: This is a police opeartional matter
